title: Practitioner Competency Workshop for Improving Online Learning Awareness (Self-Directed)

context.additional_context: A program for practitioners focusing on adapting to smartphone-based online learning environments, aiming to enhance digital literacy for office/administrative staff in vocational training institutions

learning_goals: Participants can explain communication methods using online learning tools (such as Zoom and mobile survey apps).
Participants can apply core elements of online learning (instructor characteristics, social presence, instructional design) derived from survey-based research to real-world tasks.
Participants can develop an action plan to improve their own online learning environment through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
